alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Desha, southeastern Monroe, southeastern Jefferson and Arkansas Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gillett, or 15 miles southwest of White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gillett... Almyra... St. Charles... Merrisach Lake... De Witt... Arkansas Post... Ethel... De Luce... Almyra Airport... Tichnor... Crocketts Bluff... Indian Bay... Lodge Corner... Weber... Cross Roads in Monroe County... Reydell... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
